QuestData.Title: Joining the Hunt
QuestData.Description: We are one stronger. Your help is invaluable.$B$BLet's move on westward to Rensai's Watchpost to find the last member for our party.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride with Taran Zhu, Taoshi, and Lao-Chin to Rensai's Watchpost.
QuestData.RewardText: We are close. I can feel the unnatural hatred surging.$B$BIt's a testament to the training of the Shado-Pan that the forces here have not been consumed by its influence.
